fullStackMern.title: Full-Stack Web Development with MERN Stack
fullStackMern.description: Developing robust, scalable web applications using MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, and Node.js, ensuring full-stack proficiency from database management to front-end interfaces.

frontend.title: Front-End Development
frontend.description: Crafting responsive, high-performance user interfaces using modern technologies like React.js and SCSS, focused on delivering seamless user experiences.

backend.title: Back-End Development
backend.description: Building secure and efficient server-side architectures using Node.js and Express.js, tailored for scalable and high-performing applications.

api.title: RESTful API Development
api.description: Designing and implementing RESTful APIs to ensure smooth communication and data transfer between systems and services.

database.title: Database Management
database.description: Expertly designing, optimizing, and maintaining databases with MongoDB to deliver high performance, reliability, and security.

deployment.title: Deployment & Hosting
deployment.description: Deploying and managing applications on platforms such as Vercel and Heroku, providing stable, secure, and scalable hosting solutions.

android.title: Android Development with Flutter
android.description: Developing intuitive, feature-rich Android applications using Flutter, with a focus on modern design principles and user-centric experiences.

firebase.title: Firebase Integration
firebase.description: Seamlessly integrating Firebase services into Android applications, enabling real-time databases, authentication, push notifications, and more.

apiMobile.title: API Integration
apiMobile.description: Integrating external APIs into Android applications to enhance functionality and provide seamless data interaction.
